input: text: Volunteer work fosters community spirit and empathy. It provides assistance to those in need. Engaging in altruistic activities enriches one's life.

Volunteer work fosters community spirit and empathy.

It provides assistance to those in need.

Engaging in altruistic activities enriches one's life.
